mapper.select: SELECT NAME AS Name, ID AS Id, EMAIL AS Email, BIRTHDATE AS BirthDate FROM QUSER WHERE USERID = #{userid} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUSER ( ID, NAME, USERID, PASSWORD, GENDER, EMAIL, BIRTHDATE, CAR_MANUFACTURER, CAR_MODEL, USER_NAME ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(ID),0)+1 FROM QUSER ), #{name}, #{userid}, #{password}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{birthdate}, #{carManufacturer}, #{carModel}, #{userName} )
